subject: Call For Papers (Sep 2019) (Impact Factor: 2.545)
body:
*International Journal of Latest Engineering and Man**agement Research* *ISSN: 2455-4847* *Impact Factor: 2.545* *Volume 04 - Issue 09( Sep 2019)* Dear Professor / Researcher, *International Journal of Latest Engineering and Management Research* *(IJLEMR)* is a scholarly online, open access, peer-reviewed, interdisciplinary, monthly, and fully refereed journal focusing on theories, methods and applications in Engineering, Management, Science, & Technology. It is our immense pleasure to introduce International Journal of Latest Engineering and Management Research to cater to the publication needs of teachers, scientists, scholars, students and professionals. We thank all the forces with us, in the form of eminent advisory board and editorial board for all their cooperation and enthusiastic involvement in this blooming endeavor. We publish original research articles, review articles and technical notes. The journal reviews papers within 03-04 days of submission and publishes accepted articles on the internet immediately upon receiving the final versions. The Journal welcomes the submission of manuscripts that meet the general criteria of significance and scientific excellence. For this purpose we would like to ask you to contribute your excellent papers in engineering sciences and management relevant fields. *Why publishing with The IJLEMR?* IJLEMR Impact Factor is 2.545 All articles published in the journals are open access: Universally accessible online without charge. Easy submission and peer-review makes the whole process of publishing your article simple and efficient. High visibility for your work: Anyone with internet access can read or your download. Professional formatting and reviewing meets the standards expected by authors and worldwide research community. IJLEMR index all published papers in worldwide indexing (Google Scholar, Ulrich Periodicals, EBSCO HOST, CSA, CAB Abstract, and DOAJ). IJLEMR publishes online as well as print version both. *Important Dates* *Last date of paper submission* 30 Sep 2019 *Author Notification* within 24 hours *Review report declaration date* Within 03-04 days *Last Date of Publication* Within 07 days after registration *Submission Process* Authors are kindly invited to submit their formatted full papers. All paper submissions will be blind peer reviewed and evaluated based on originality, Research content, correctness, relevance to conference and readability. Please read complete submission and formatting guidelines before submitting your paper. *Online Submission:* Paper Submission can be completed online at www.ijlemr.com/submit-paper.html *Email Submission:* If you are unable to submit your manuscript using Online System, you may submit with complete details via email to editor@ijlemr.com <+editor@ijlemr.com> Happy Submitting!!! *With Best Regards * *IJLEMR Team * *International Journal of Latest Engineering and Management Research (IJLEMR) * *ISSN: 2455-4847* *You may unsubscribe to stop receiving our emails.*

International Journal of Latest Engineering and Management Research

 

ISSN: 2455-4847

Impact Factor: 2.545


Volume 04 - Issue 09( Sep 2019)

 

 

Dear Professor / Researcher,

International Journal of Latest Engineering and Management Research (IJLEMR) is a scholarly online, open access, peer-reviewed, interdisciplinary, monthly, and fully refereed journal focusing on theories, methods and applications in Engineering, Management, Science, & Technology.

It is our immense pleasure to introduce International Journal of Latest Engineering and Management Research to cater to the publication needs of teachers, scientists, scholars, students and professionals. We thank all the forces with us, in the form of eminent advisory board and editorial board for all their cooperation and enthusiastic involvement in this blooming endeavor.

We publish original research articles, review articles and technical notes. The journal reviews papers within 03-04 days of submission and publishes accepted articles on the internet immediately upon receiving the final versions. The Journal welcomes the submission of manuscripts that meet the general criteria of significance and scientific excellence. For this purpose we would like to ask you to contribute your excellent papers in engineering sciences and management relevant fields.

 

Why publishing with The IJLEMR?

  IJLEMR Impact Factor is 2.545

  All articles published in the journals are open access: Universally accessible online without charge.

  Easy submission and peer-review makes the whole process of publishing your article simple and efficient.

  High visibility for your work: Anyone with internet access can read or your download.

  Professional formatting and reviewing meets the standards expected by authors and worldwide research community.

  IJLEMR index all published papers in worldwide indexing (Google Scholar, Ulrich Periodicals, EBSCO HOST, CSA, CAB Abstract, and DOAJ).

  IJLEMR publishes online as well as print version both. 

 

Important Dates

Last date of paper submission

30 Sep 2019

Author Notification

within 24 hours

Review report declaration date

Within 03-04 days

Last Date of Publication

Within 07 days after registration

 

Submission Process

Authors are kindly invited to submit their formatted full papers.

All paper submissions will be blind peer reviewed and evaluated based on originality, Research content, correctness, relevance to conference and readability. Please read complete submission and formatting guidelines before submitting your paper.

 

  Online Submission: Paper Submission can be completed online at www.ijlemr.com/submit-paper.html

 

  Email Submission: If you are unable to submit your manuscript using Online System, you may submit with complete details via email to editor@ijlemr.com

 

 

Happy Submitting!!!

 

 

 

With Best Regards 

IJLEMR Team 

International Journal of Latest Engineering and Management Research (IJLEMR) 

ISSN: 2455-4847


You may unsubscribe to stop receiving our emails.
